div.p: E74/15259, unit 749, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending
31st December 1874.

cell.p:
Total -
Fifty pounds --- shillings
and --- pence
